name: BLOCK RUNNER: ADVENTURE
description:
❗️ On mobile browser, it starts in portrait view which is not intended. When it happens, swipe to go back and tap "Restore game" button. Then you can play in landscape view which is normal.

Tetris Puzzle + Runner Game!!! 
 Build stairs and bridges to keep Frogman running!

  • You're going to control blocks like Tetris. 
  • Frogman only jumps up 1 step.
  • Frogman can jump down to ground.

Keyboard control
Left: ←
Right: →
Rotate: R or ↑
Drop: Space
